price: Ɔno na Ɔbͻͻ owuo ne nkwa sε Ɔde bεsͻ mo ahwε (de akyerε) mo mu nea odi dwuma pa. Ɔne Otumfoͻ no a Otumi ade nyinaa yε, Bͻnefakyε Hene no.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبۡلُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhī khalaqa al-mawta wal-ḥayata liyabluwakum ayyukum aḥsanu ʿamalan wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ghafūru
